name: Hotel Au Rivoli

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were given a room on the top floor - the room was small but not tiny, and well appointed. Soon we noticed there was a lot of noise coming from the air conditioning units on the roof. When I asked about it the woman at the desk seemed not to know about it and, in any case, told me there were no other rooms available. The following day we asked for and got relocated to a room one floor lower. This room was tiny with barely room for our suitcases. We had to put one in front of the door. Also this room, unlike the first, had a bathtub with telephone shower which I am not fond of. Towels were of the linen style variety and not very effective, but the room and bathroom were spotlessly clean.
reviews.title: Great location, tiny room, decent breakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We later discovered that the noise was from a malfunctioning AC unit which was fixed the next day.
reviews.title: In the heart of old town

reviews.text: Location was ideal for exploration of Sorrento and for ferry trips to the Amalfi Coast and Capri. Parking was 20 Euros/night and in a garage several blocks away - but the parking guy was very nice and didn't charge extra when we took the car for day trips.
reviews.title: Very good hotel
Great location, very clean!
reviews.text: When we arrived we were disappointed that someone had been smoking in our room prior to checking in and due to severe allergies we had to complain. They were kind enough to give us another nicer room for our first night while they did there best to air it out. We moved in to our other room on day two. Martina on the front desk was very helpful and Gionni was great as well. If you are planning a visit to Sorrento you should choose the old part of town as there are many fine places to eat.

reviews.title: Comfort in the Heart of Sorrento!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is beautiful, modern, in a great location, clean, well-priced, and the staff is very helpful and friendly. I will definitely stay again next time I visit Sorrento. I highly recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I absolutely LOVED this hotel. They have a fabulous outdoor eating area where you can take your own goodies, a rooftop terrace for happy hour times or sunning, etc. The place has a very clean, nice aroma throughout, with a modern yet warm atmosphere.
reviews.title: the BEST experience

reviews.text: The staff was very helpful with any of my requests.
reviews.title: Bright, clean, great value: a real find in the middle of Sorrento

reviews.text: However, the only hitch was having the top floor room that sleeps two as the ceiling slopes and you have to constantly watch your head in the bedroom and bathroom!
reviews.title: Very charming and accommodating

reviews.text: and, for a new place, it surprises me to not have a shower...only a top with a handheld shower wand. It seems they could've mounted that somehow. Perhaps they do in other rooms, but mine had the sloped ceiling and possibly couldn't accomodate that.
reviews.title: Great little hotel in the perfect position for exploring Sorrento

reviews.text: THis is a delightful hotel, the only downside was the water was only warm in the evening.
reviews.title: Lovely

description: The Hotel Au Rivoli is situated in a beautiful building belonging to the XII century, in the heart of Sorrento, overlooking the sea, close to Piazza Tasso, the port and the train station, where leave also the busses to reach the Amalfi Coast.Completely renowated, the hotel offers double, triple and very comfortable family rooms so is suitable both for families, both for individuals and little groups. All the modern rooms offer the best comfort: private bathroom, air conditioning, safe, hairdryer, satellite tv, minibar and a balcony facing the historical centre… The hotel is also close to restaurants, museums, theather , beaches… It is ideal for shopping and to enjoy the typical atmosphere and the night life of the historical centre.
